lines.text: You say to the boy "Open your eyes". When he opens his eyes and sees the light, you make him cry out, saying "Oh, Blue, come forth! Oh, Blue, arise! Oh, Blue, ascend! Oh, Blue, come in!"
Charity has allowed the uncaring to appear to care.
The Gautama Bhudda advises me to Walk Away from Illness. But he wasn't attached to a drip...
We've always been mistreated and the moment anyone gives us the slightest bit of attention we over-react with our thanks.
At the bottom is a space for me to sign, showing that I understand that all these things are a possibility. I really don't know what I am going to do. I am going to sign it.
Oral DHP is consumed by the liver, so they've tweaked a molecule to fool the system.
What need have I for so much news from abroad when all that concerns either life or death is at once transacting within me?
...a sense of unreality drowned in theatre...
The Council replied they were not concerned
[about HIV awareness]
since "there are no queers in the district. Although you might try District X, they have a theatre".
I place a delphinium, Blue, upon your grave.
My heart's memory goes to you. David, Howard, Graham, Terry, Paul...
All this talk of purebloods and blue bloods and I sit here and you sit there. Overnight a plane crashed into a mountain and 500 were fried alive in their sleep.
Graham committed suicide. How did he do it? It seemed incidental. What did it matter if he swigged prussic acid or shot himself in the eye? Maybe he dived from the cloud-lapped skyscrapers.

[eye scan]
I say to him "this looks like a planet". He says "Oh, I think it looks like a pizza!"
From the bottom of your heart, pray to be released from Image.
I have walked behind the sky.
For what are you seeking?
The fathomless blue of bliss.
The virus rages fierce.
I step into a blue funk.
